p: A similar protocol to that of Albrecht et al. [ 23] was used in this study. Briefly, 50 mg from each sample was extracted with 50% ( v/ v) acetonitrile (Romil far UV grade, Microsep, Johannesburg, South Africa) containing 0.1% ( v/ v) formic acid (Sigma-Aldrich, Johannesburg, South Africa). In all cases, ultrapure water (MilliQ) was used as a diluent. This study was carried out at the Central Analytical Facilities (CAF), Stellenbosch University, Stellenbosch, South Africa.
